column4: Linux operating system ubuntu was working with me without a problem and suddenly a message appears and returned to work and then returned the same problem does not accept entry After takeoff box appears entitled  the system is running in low-graphics mode Written underneath your screen graphics card and input device settings could not be detected correctly you will need to configure these yourself When you click on a word ok Box app
what video chip do you use?
run:  lspci | grep -i vga     what is output?
press CTRL+ALT+F1 and run it there, you can use CTRL+ALT+F7
